name: IMAP Mailbox
summary: Folder created by Apple Mail, the default email client for Mac OS X; includes subdirectories named /​Attachments/​ (for storing email attachments, which may include .EMLXPART files) and /​Messages/​ (for storing .EMLX email messages); saves local copies of email messages from an IMAP account that has been setup in the software.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
